# {{lb|zh|archaic}} to sit behind a curtain (and handle matters of state)

===Usage notes===
* A practice which allowed an [[empress]] or [[w:empress dowager|empress dowager]] to preside at court, without actually being seen by her subjects (which was forbidden). This would usually be done by the mother of a child emperor.
